resources.string: Entrance Ticket with Lan-Party: 10 €\nEntrance Ticket normal: 2,50 €

Unigames is a new gaming event targeted 
for all university students in Helsinki 
metropolitan area. Take part and challenge 
your friends in different games and 
competitions to win some prizes. The 
event culminates into a League of Legends 
tournament finale. Qualification matches 
will be played online during previous weeks. 
All university students are allowed to take 
part on the tournament, but you don’t have 
to play the game to attend the event.
